ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah...med bronze....i ve yet to see where to get some, but i know you can in najena  and i ve heard perma since the patch......but those are higher
ygData.messageBody:
yeah...med bronze....i've yet to see where to get some, but i know you can in
najena <i believe> and i've heard perma since the patch......but those are
higher lv dungeons and really makes no sense because by the time you can get med
bronze, you're high enough to get better...like rubi or wis adding
stuff.....really weird....

Rob Berryhill wrote:

> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> It is *very* easy to have full bronze by 18 or before! Just go to Unrest and
> buy all the bronze off of the over-weight people in there. It sells for
> cheap. Of course, that only works for us stouts. If you want medium bronze,
> good luck.
>
> Astur, Cleric of Brell
